pages.text: Welcome to Amethyst Imbuement! Ready to start on a magical journey? Take with these simple steps to begin down your path. Once you complete this guide, you'll be a full-fledged Crystal Witch, imbuing items with magic, casting spells, and more!

amethyst_imbuement:progression/basic_mat.text: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/amethyst)Amethyst Shards$() are the entrypoint to Amethyst Imbuement, find yourself a geode! $(item)Crying Obsidian$() is an important ingredient in AI altars.

amethyst_imbuement:flower_power.text: Many recipes use flowers, especially the 4 double-high flowers ($(item)Sunflower$(), $(item)Peony$(), $(item)Rose Bush$(), $(item)Lilac$()).

amethyst_imbuement:progression/imbuing_t.text: Craft your $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$(), opening the door to most of the rest of the mod!

amethyst_imbuement:xp_bush.text: Imbuing is powered by experience. Imbue some $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/xp_bush_seed)Experience Bushes$() to secure a steady supply. Augment your stocks by enchanting gear with $(l:amethyst_imbuement:enchantments/new_weapon_enchants#insight)Insight$().

amethyst_imbuement:progression/progressi.text: There's a lot to do in AI! Check out the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/progression_guide)Progression Guide$() to learn more.
